$interpreted: Grandpa: Wait...Nolva, wait...
Grandpa: You have to go to today's meeting. You'll get to know a lot of friends!
Nolva: NO!
Nolva: They're always calling me "girl with the freaky disease" and saying that if people come near me, they will be "infected" and become just like me.
Nolva: They will sleep their whole life and find themselves super old when they wake up...
Grandpa: That won't happen. As long as you are willing to be open-minded, they will...
Nolva: I said no already! I can live by myself no problem.
Nolva: I hate you, grandpa! Leave me alone!
Yamitsuki: (The "worthy research subject" Aosta mentioned, should live right here...)
Yamitsuki: Who's there!
Nolva: ......
Nolva: ......
Nolva: Umm~ Did I dream about grandpa again?
Nolva: Eh, who are you!?
Yamitsuki: Please calm down. I'm not here to harm you.
Nolva: Says every bad guy ever!
Yamitsuki: 7th of Fire Month, was that the first day you moved in here?
Nolva: How did you...so you stalked me as well?
Yamitsuki: A few days after that, the woman who lived next door to you was assaulted and injured by an unknown figure.
Nolva: Assaulted? The same incidents that happened in the civilian districts...how is that possible...
Nolva: Wait, what do you mean by after that? What day is today?
Yamitsuki: 10th of Mist Month.
Nolva: I slept for two months? So my void disease symptoms have surfaced again...
Yamitsuki: As expected, you have void disease.
Nolva: Just who in the world are you?
Yamitsuki: I'm Yamitsuki, assistant of a doctor who operates on the Prairie.
Yamitsuki: He wants me to find those troubled by void disease, and bring them to him.
Nolva: Doctor!? He can treat void disease?
Yamitsuki: If you want to know the answer, visit him at this location. His name is Aosta Clovis.
Nolva: If my void disease is cured, I won't fall asleep for such long periods anymore.
Nolva: No longer will I be treated like some kind of monster...
Nolva: Wait a second. How did you know I...

Model.Text: Wait...Nolva, wait...
You have to go to today's meeting. You'll get to know a lot of friends!
NO!
They're always calling me "girl with the freaky disease" and saying that if people come near me, they will be "infected" and become just like me.
They will sleep their whole life and find themselves super old when they wake up...
That won't happen. As long as you are willing to be open-minded, they will...
I said no already! I can live by myself no problem.

(The "worthy research subject" Aosta mentioned, should live right here...)

Umm~ Did I dream about grandpa again?
Eh, who are you!?
Please calm down. I'm not here to harm you.
Says every bad guy ever!

How did you...so you stalked me as well?

Wait, what do you mean by after that? What day is today?
10th of Mist Month.
I slept for two months? So my void disease symptoms have surfaced again...
As expected, you have void disease.
Just who in the world are you?
I'm Yamitsuki, assistant of a doctor who operates on the Prairie.
He wants me to find those troubled by void disease, and bring them to him.
Doctor!? He can treat void disease?
If you want to know the answer, visit him at this location. His name is Aosta Clovis.
If my void disease is cured, I won't fall asleep for such long periods anymore.
No longer will I be treated like some kind of monster...
Wait a second. How did you know I...
